DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Monthly Distribution
Utilization per User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration:
{
 "size": {
    "height": 250
  },
  "allowSortingBySummary": true,
  "allowSorting": true,
  "allowFiltering": true,
  "allowExpandAll":true,
  "height": 250,
  "showBorders": true,
  "fieldPanel": {
      "showColumnFields": true,
      "showDataFields": true,
      "showFilterFields": true,
      "showRowFields": true,
      "allowFieldDragging": true,
      "visible": true
  },
  "wordWrapEnabled":false,
  "dataSource": {
    "fields": [
      {
        "caption": "Department",
        "width": 120,
        "dataField": "Department",
        "area": "row",
        "expanded":true
      },
      {
        "dataField": "Company",
        "dataType": "string",
        "area": "filter",
        "expanded":true
      },
      {
        "dataField": "Responsible",
        "dataType": "string",
        "area": "filter",
        "expanded":true
      },
      {
        "dataField": "User",
        "dataType": "string",
        "area": "row",
        "expanded":true
      },
       {
        "caption": "Capacity",
        "dataField": "Capacity",
        "area": "data",
        "dataType": "number",
        "summaryType": "sum",
        "format":"#,###.#"
      },
     {
        "caption": "Client",
        "dataField": "ClientHours",
        "dataType": "number",
        "summaryType": "sum",
        "area": "data",
        "format":"#,###.#"
      },
      {
        "caption": "New Business",
        "dataField": "NewBusinessHours",
        "dataType": "number",
        "area": "data",
        "summaryType": "sum",
        "format":"#,###.#"
              },
      {
        "caption": "Administrative",
        "dataField": "AdministrativeHours",
        "dataType": "number",
        "area": "data",
        "summaryType": "sum",
        "format":"#,###.#"
      },
      {
        "caption": "Other",
        "dataField": "NonWorkedHours",
        "dataType": "number",
        "area": "data",
        "summaryType": "sum",
        "format":"#,###.#"
      },
      {
        "caption": "Utilization %",
        "dataField": "UtilizationPercentage",
"dataType": "number",
        "area": "data",
        "format":{"type":"percent", "precision":1},
        "summaryType": "avg"
      }
    ],
    "store": null
  },
   "onCellPrepared": "function(e) {var dataField = e.component.getDataSource().getAreaFields('data')[e.cell.dataIndex];if(e.area=='data' && dataField.caption=='Utilization %'){if(e.cell.value<0.8){e.cellElement.style.backgroundColor = '#F57E4A'; e.cellElement.style.color = '#ffffff';}if(e.cell.value<0.5){e.cellElement.style.backgroundColor = '#EB3573'; e.cellElement.style.color = '#ffffff';}}}"
}
